description:
Wing Bind Pipers 2nd Umbrella.
Ninny is called "Ninny-chan" by her junior Noel, although the added "chan" annoys her. With her ribbon-style blonde hair and bright cheerful personality, Ninny`s emotions are easy to read. She is determined to join the tactical dragon extermination squad Sabers, and her passion for earning achievements and awards is unmatched even compared to Noel. Ninny is also the leader of the popular idol group "Cecile Die Twice".
Source: Official page
name: Ninny Spangcole
